name: DBS-NeatlyGone
author: DBStheme

sections.description:
Sometimes you just wanna hide a post and redirect it to a whole different URL in the way you want. For that times this plugin might come handy!

Some of the features:

  • You can HIDE or REDIRECT a post or even both.
  • It works simple and does not mess with with your other plugins.

Supported languages:

  • English
  • Persian

for helping with the translations contact Info@DBStheme.com
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fix posts not hiding!
  • Hidden posts single page stay visible and you can redirect them anywhere!

1.0

  • Just getting started!

short_description: Trying to hide a post, page or any custom post types from your website? or just redirecting them to another URL in a specified way? or maybe both?
